      • getParser

        RewardParser getParser(java.lang.String type)
        Gets a Parser from the registry.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the parser to get.
        Returns:
        The parser, if it exists, or null otherwise.

      • registerParser

        void registerParser(RewardParser parser)
        Registers a Parser to the registry, allowing it to be used to build rewards.
        Parameters:
        parser - The parser to register.

      • deregisterParser

        RewardParser deregisterParser(java.lang.String type)
        Removes a parser from the registry.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the parser to deregister.
        Returns:
        The parser that was deregisterred if it exists, or null otherwise.

      • getDonationCount

        int getDonationCount(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets a players' donation count.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose count to query.
        Returns:
        The player's donation count.

      • setDonationCount

                      int donations)
        Update a player's donation count.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose count to update.
        donations - The value to update their donations to.
